Class SiteUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.lenya.cms.site.SiteUtil
public class SiteUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Utility to handle site structures.

Version:
$Id: SiteUtil.java 179568 2005-06-02 09:27:26Z jwkaltz $

Field Summary
static int MODE_CANCEL
          Cancel the command if one of the target document(s) exists.
static int MODE_CHANGE_ID
          Change the ID of a target document if it already exists.
static int MODE_REPLACE
          Replace the target documents.

Parameters:

                                     Document document)
                              throws SiteException
Returns a sub-site starting with a certain document, which includes the document itself and all documents which require this document, including all language versions.

Parameters:
manager - The service manager.
document - The top-level document.
Returns:
A document set.
Throws:
SiteException - if an error occurs.

getTransferedSubSite

public static DocumentSet getTransferedSubSite(org.apache.avalon.framework.service.ServiceManager manager,
                                               Document source,
                                               java.lang.String targetArea,
                                               int mode)
                                        throws SiteException
Returns a document set that represents the transfer of a sub-site to another area.

Parameters:
manager - The service manager.
source - The source document.
targetArea - The target area.
mode - The mode: MODE_REPLACE,MODE_CANCEL,MODE_CHANGE_ID.
Returns:
A document set.
Throws:
SiteException - if an error occurs.
